application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Development Site At 573 To 585, High Road, Seven Kings, Ilford
description: Discharge of conditions for approved permission 1622/22: Construction Logistics Plan (Condition 2); Archaeology (Condition 3 Part 1); Piling Method (Condition 4); Air Quality Neutrality (Condition 5); Land Contamination (Condition 6); Materials (Condition 7); External Lighting (Condition 8); Sustainable Drainage (Condition 9); Acoustic Noise and Vibration Insulation Measures (Condition 10); Soft and Hard Landscaping (Condition 14); Delivery and Servicing Plan (Condition 16); Retail Use Control (Condition 17); Child Play Area (Condition 18); Screening views (Condition 19); Refuse Storage and Recycling Details (Condition 22); Gates (Condition 23); Dust Management Plan (Condition 29); Fire Strategy (Condition 30); Rainwater Harvesting Strategy (Condition 31); and Children's Play Space Accessible to all (Condition 33). (Summary).
